statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_date, likes_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_date, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes_count > 50 AND shares_count > 20;
SELECT post_id, comments_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments_count < 10 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_date, comments_count, shares_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC, likes_count ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_date, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments_count > 50 ORDER BY comments_count DESC, post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_date, comments_count, shares_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE shares_count >= 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC, shares_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_date, shares_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shares_count ASC, post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes_count > 500 AND comments_count > 100 AND shares_count > 50 ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count DESC, shares_count DESC, post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM digital_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT user_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments > 10;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT id, post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT likes_count, comments_count FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE total_budget > 1000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, impressions_count, clicks_count, spend FROM ad_performance WHERE spend < 500 ORDER BY clicks_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT location, age, gender FROM user_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions, cost, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE roi > 3.5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics JOIN user_activity ON engagement_metrics.post_id = user_activity.post_id WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT like_id, like_date FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT engagement_id, user_id, engagement_date FROM engagements WHERE post_id = 5 AND like_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC, username ASC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.post_text, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes WHERE like_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(e.engagement_id) AS total_engagements FROM users u LEFT JOIN engagements e ON u.user_id = e.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
